attributes.action: reduce the maximum duration of a Parliament to 3 years with immediate effect so that the next general election must be held by May 2008.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would reduce the chances of having several years of a government led by a Prime Mininster with no mandate from the electorate and no idea how to run the country.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
